mapper.select: SELECT schedule_id, room_id, user_id, title, description, start_at, end_at, start_time, end_time, type, color_hex, text_color, custom_type_label, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM schedules WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND deleted_at IS NULL AND start_at <= DATE_SUB(#{endExclusive}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND end_at >= #{start} ORDER BY start_at ASC, schedule_id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE schedules SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, start_at = #{startAt}, end_at = #{endAt}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, type = #{type}, color_hex = #{colorHex}, text_color = #{textColor}, custom_type_label = #{customTypeLabel} WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId} AND room_id = #{roomId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_id, room_id, user_id, title, description, start_at, end_at, start_time, end_time, type, color_hex, text_color, custom_type_label, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM schedules WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND deleted_at IS NULL AND type = 'EXAM' AND start_at >= CURDATE() ORDER BY (start_at > CURDATE()) DESC, start_at ASC LIMIT 1
